===========
is_changing
===========

Indicates whether the item is in edit or insert state

.. js:function:: is_changing() 

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

Description
===========

Checks if an item is in edit or insert state and returns true if it is.

An application calls :doc:`edit <m_edit>` to put an item into edit state and
:doc:`append <m_append>` or :doc:`insert <m_insert>` to put an item into insert state.
